entrypoints.name: mapreduce-validators
entrypoints.buildCommand: rm -rf ./build && mkdir build && rustup override set nightly && RUST_LOG=debug cargo run --release --example mapreduce_validators build && cp ./target/release/examples/mapreduce_validators ./build/mapreduce_validators

entrypoints.name: rust-function
entrypoints.buildCommand: mkdir build && RUST_LOG=debug cargo run --release --example eth_call build && mv ./target/release/examples/eth_call ./build/eth_call
